items.content_html: HomiFy is a lightweight Airbnb-inspired web application built with Node.js, Express, EJS, and MongoDB. It allows users to list and explore accommodations, providing an intuitive and user-friendly experience for travelers and hosts.

items.content_html: Easy Time-Blocking is a lightweight, web-based scheduling tool that helps you visually plan your day. Simply drag or tap time slots to create blocks, add tasks and notes, and optionally mark recurring schedules. Past days automatically move to the Archive for later viewing. It’s written in pure HTML/CSS/JS (stored in local storage).
items.title: Technical-1/Easy-Time-Blocking: Easy Time-Blocking is a lightweight, web-based scheduling tool that helps you visually plan your day. Simply drag or tap time slots to create blocks, add tasks and notes, and optionally mark recurring schedules. Past days automatically move to the Archive for later viewing. It’s written in pure HTML/CSS/JS (stored in local storage).

items.content_html: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.
items.title: JBerendes/PlayMyPodcast: PlayMyPodcast is a lightweight, serverless app that transforms your podcast RSS feed into a seamless, voice-controlled listening experience on Google Home. It fetches and parses your podcast feed, creating a playable playlist with support for standard media commands like play, pause, and skip.
